mapper.select: SELECT CODE AS NATIONID, NAME AS NATION, 0 AS DEGREE FROM BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT WHERE DEGREE='NATION' AND ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY NLSSORT(NATION, 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
select CODE AS FID, NAME AS FPROVINCE, 1 AS DEGREE from BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT WHERE DEGREE='DISTRICT_PROVINCE' AND ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY NLSSORT(FPROVINCE, 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

select prov.CODE AS FID, prov.NAME AS FPROVINCE, 1 AS DEGREE from BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT prov left join T_BAS_DISTRICT nat on prov.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = nat.CODE WHERE prov.DEGREE='DISTRICT_PROVINCE' AND nat.CODE = '100000' AND prov.ACTIVE='Y' AND nat.ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY NLSSORT(FPROVINCE, 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

SELECT a.CODE AS CITY_ID, b.CODE AS PROVINCE_ID, b.NAME AS FPROVINCE, a.NAME AS FCITY, a.PINYIN AS FPINYIN, a.PINYIN_ABBR AS FSHORTPY, 2 AS DEGREE FROM BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT a LEFT JOIN BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT b ON a.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = b.CODE WHERE a.DEGREE='CITY' and b.DEGREE='DISTRICT_PROVINCE' AND a.ACTIVE='Y' and b.ACTIVE='Y'

SELECT city.CODE AS CITY_ID, prov.CODE AS PROVINCE_ID, county.CODE AS COUNTY_ID, prov.NAME AS FPROVINCE,county.NAME AS FCOUNTY, city.NAME AS FCITY, county.PINYIN AS FPINYIN, county.PINYIN_ABBR AS FSHORTPY,3 AS DEGREE FROM BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT county LEFT JOIN BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT city ON county.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = city.CODE LEFT JOIN BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT prov ON city.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = prov.CODE WHERE city.DEGREE='CITY' AND prov.DEGREE='DISTRICT_PROVINCE' AND county.DEGREE='DISTRICT_COUNTY' AND county.ACTIVE='Y' AND city.ACTIVE='Y' AND prov.ACTIVE='Y'

SELECT a.CODE AS CITY_ID, b.CODE AS PROVINCE_ID, b.NAME AS FPROVINCE, a.NAME AS FCITY, a.PINYIN AS FPINYIN, a.PINYIN_ABBR AS FSHORTPY, 2 AS DEGREE FROM BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT a LEFT JOIN BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT b ON a.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = b.CODE WHERE a.DEGREE='CITY' and b.DEGREE='DISTRICT_PROVINCE' AND a.IS_HOT_CITY='Y' AND a.ACTIVE='Y' AND b.ACTIVE='Y'

SELECT city.CODE AS CITY_ID, prov.CODE AS PROVINCE_ID, county.CODE AS COUNTY_ID, prov.NAME AS FPROVINCE, county.NAME AS FCOUNTY, city.NAME AS FCITY, county.PINYIN AS FPINYIN, county.PINYIN_ABBR AS FSHORTPY, 3 AS DEGREE FROM BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT county LEFT JOIN BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT city ON county.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = city.CODE LEFT JOIN BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT prov ON city.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = prov.CODE where city.CODE = #{cityId} AND county.ACTIVE='Y' AND prov.ACTIVE='Y' AND city.ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY NLSSORT(FCOUNTY, 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

SELECT PROV.PARENT_DISTRICT_NAME AS NATION, PROV.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE AS NATIONID, 0 AS DEGREE FROM BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT PROV WHERE PROV.CODE = #{provinceCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PROV.DEGREE = 'DISTRICT_PROVINCE' AND PROV.ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT A.CODE AS CITY_ID, B.CODE AS PROVINCE_ID, B.NAME AS FPROVINCE, A.NAME AS FCITY, A.PINYIN AS FPINYIN, A.PINYIN_ABBR AS FSHORTPY, 2 AS DEGREE FROM BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT A LEFT JOIN BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT B ON A.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = B.CODE WHERE A.DEGREE = 'CITY' AND B.DEGREE = 'DISTRICT_PROVINCE' AND A.ACTIVE = #{active, jdbcType=CHAR} AND B.ACTIVE = #{active, jdbcType=CHAR} AND A.NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

SELECT city.CODE AS CITY_ID, prov.CODE AS PROVINCE_ID, prov.NAME AS FPROVINCE, city.NAME AS FCITY, city.PINYIN AS FPINYIN, city.PINYIN_ABBR AS FSHORTPY, 2 AS DEGREE FROM BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT city LEFT JOIN BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT prov ON city.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = prov.CODE where prov.CODE = #{provinceId} AND city.ACTIVE='Y' AND prov.ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY NLSSORT(FCITY, 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

SELECT prov.CODE AS FID, prov.NAME AS FPROVINCE, 1 AS DEGREE FROM BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT prov LEFT JOIN BSE.T_BAS_DISTRICT nat ON prov.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = nat.CODE where nat.CODE = #{nationId} AND prov.ACTIVE='Y' AND nat.ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY NLSSORT(FPROVINCE, 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

select city.CODE AS CITY_ID, prov.CODE AS PROVINCE_ID, county.CODE AS COUNTY_ID, prov.NAME AS FPROVINCE, city.NAME AS FCITY, county.NAME AS FCOUNTY, country.name AS VILLAGENAME, country.code AS VILLAGEID, 4 AS DEGREE FROM bse.t_bas_district country LEFT JOIN bse.t_bas_district county ON country.parent_district_code = county.code AND COUNTY.ACTIVE = 'Y' LEFT JOIN bse.t_bas_district city ON county.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = city.CODE AND CITY.ACTIVE = 'Y' LEFT JOIN bse.t_bas_district prov ON city.PARENT_DISTRICT_CODE = prov.CODE AND PROV.ACTIVE = 'Y' where county.CODE =#{countryId} AND country.Active = 'Y'
